revised_title: Exploring the Dynamics of Learning and Forgetting in Mimicry Systems
tldr: The authors present a generalized behavioral model of learning and forgetting in predators, focusing on mimicry systems. They examine the results of various learning models in laboratory experiments and discuss the dynamics of mimicry in the wild. The study highlights the need for further research into predator psychology and the nature of learning in complex environments.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Animal Behavior
